name: Acceleration Primitive
description: Geometry emerging only during changes in motion (non-zero acceleration).

name: Occlusion Primitive
description: Structures appearing when objects partially block light.

name: Phase-Shift Primitive
description: Patterns emerging during brightness oscillations or illumination phase shifts.

name: Multi-Scale Persistence Primitive
description: Same geometry appearing across multiple spatial scales.

name: Symmetry-Breaking Event
description: Stable form collapses into another configuration.
